channel.title: Comments on: MTN’s Rebranded Look is Stirring Public Outrage
channel.description: Web Ã— Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/mtn-rebranded-look-is-stirring-public-outrage/#comment-490">Wilson20</a>.
Hahaha. I share the same sentiment with you on this one. Minimalism is a concept well embraced in Architecture, Fashion, Interior Decoration, but not sure about tech. Besides, this one is too extreme. So, let's watch out and see how this would play out.
I see them doing yet another rebrand within the five years.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Wilson20.

Hahaha. I share the same sentiment with you on this one. Minimalism is a concept well embraced in Architecture, Fashion, Interior Decoration, but not sure about tech. Besides, this one is too extreme. So, let’s watch out and see how this would play out.

I see them doing yet another rebrand within the five years.

item.title: By: Wilson20
item.dc:creator: Wilson20
item.description:
Horrible logo. Minimal route gone too far. Will it succeed, though? Yes, but simply on the basis of their fat budget helping marketing, promotions, and strategy.
Overall, crappy logo.
item.content:encoded:
Horrible logo. Minimal route gone too far. Will it succeed, though? Yes, but simply on the basis of their fat budget helping marketing, promotions, and strategy.

Overall, crappy logo.

item.title: By: Baker Hassan Temitope
item.dc:creator: Baker Hassan Temitope
item.description: The logo looks horrible when compared to the former one.
item.content:encoded: The logo looks horrible when compared to the former one.
